scripts.install:components: npm ci --prefix stencil-components && npm ci --prefix angular-components && npm ci --prefix storybook && npm ci --prefix vue-components && npm ci --prefix react-components
scripts.build:components:stencil: cd stencil-components && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build:components:react-components: cd react-components && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build:components:angular-components: cd angular-components && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build:components:vue-components: cd vue-components && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build:app:angular: npm ci --prefix angular-app && npm run build --prefix angular-app
scripts.build:app:ember: npm ci --prefix ember-app && npm run build --prefix ember-app
scripts.build:app:react: npm ci --prefix react-app && npm run build --prefix react-app
scripts.build:app:storybook: npm ci --prefix storybook && npm run build --prefix storybook
scripts.build:app:vue: npm ci --prefix vue-app && npm run build --prefix vue-app
scripts.build: npm run install:components && npm-run-all -s build:components:* copy-stencil-output && npm-run-all -s build:app:* && npm run copy-vanilla-html
